enhancedContent.overview: 99 Ad Creation Midjourney Prompts Version 2 is a curated collection of battle-tested prompts specifically designed to generate professional advertising visuals using Midjourney AI. Instead of spending hundreds or thousands on graphic designers or struggling with complicated design software, you get ready-to-use prompts that create scroll-stopping ad creatives in minutes. This Notion database provides 99 carefully crafted prompts optimized for advertising aesthetics, product photography styles, lifestyle imagery, and promotional graphics. Perfect for marketers, e-commerce sellers, social media advertisers, and entrepreneurs, this resource democratizes professional ad creation by leveraging AI to produce visuals that would cost significant money if commissioned from designers.

features: 99 pre-written Midjourney prompts optimized for advertising aesthetics
Copy-paste functionality for instant use in Midjourney
Prompt structure designed for consistent, professional results
Clear instructions on parameters and customization options
Product photography prompts for e-commerce and retail ads
Lifestyle and emotional imagery for brand campaigns
Promotional graphics for social media advertising
Multiple aesthetic variations from minimalist to bold and vibrant
Notion database format for easy browsing and filtering
Categorized prompts by ad type and visual style
Bookmarkable page for quick reference during campaigns
Pay-what-you-want pricing with free download option
Create client ad creatives at fraction of designer costs
Generate unlimited variations for A/B testing campaigns
Build visual assets library for ongoing marketing needs
Sell AI-generated ad creatives as a service to businesses

faqs.question: How do I get started with these Midjourney prompts?
faqs.answer: After downloading the Notion template, bookmark or duplicate it to your workspace. When you need ad creative, browse the 99 prompts, find one matching your needs, copy it, and paste it into Midjourney. You can customize product names, colors, or styles before generating.

faqs.question: What's included in the 99 prompts?
faqs.answer: You get a diverse collection covering product photography, lifestyle advertising imagery, promotional graphics, and various aesthetic styles. Each prompt is pre-tested to generate professional results suitable for social media ads, Google Display, print campaigns, and marketing materials.

faqs.question: Do I need design experience to use these prompts?
faqs.answer: No design experience required! The prompts are ready to use as-is. Simply copy, paste into Midjourney, and generate. If you want to customize them, the template includes guidance on tweaking parameters, but it's completely optional.

faqs.question: Can I really make money with these prompts?
faqs.answer: Yes! Many users offer Midjourney ad creation services to local businesses, e-commerce sellers, or social media clients. With these optimized prompts, you can generate professional ad creatives for clients who can't afford traditional design agencies, typically charging $50-200 per project.
